sentences.english: Mountain flowers in the previous award and award-winning West Lake Expo a few ranking highest in the province.
sentences.chinese: 在历次山花奖和西湖博览会上获奖数均居全省前茅。

sentences.english: King of Sweden hands each winner a  diploma and a  medal.
sentences.chinese: 由瑞士国王亲手将证书和奖章授予获奖者。

sentences.english: No matter prize-winner nationality and sex.
sentences.chinese: 获奖者不论国籍和性别。

sentences.english: Bill grudged Dick his prize even though he had won a better prize himself.
sentences.chinese: 比尔妒忌迪克获奖，尽管他自己获得了更高的荣誉。

sentences.english: Winners of present-day TV game shows no longer get money from the shows.
sentences.chinese: 获奖者的电视娱乐节目，现在不再从节目得钱。

sentences.english: Did you feel there was any show/actor that got cheated?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得他值得所获奖项吗？

sentences.english: Chen "brother" in international for the award.
sentences.chinese: 陈超因《兄弟》在国际上获奖。

sentences.english: He begrudged his friend the award.
He gloated over his brother's failure to win the prize.
sentences.chinese: 他弟弟未能获奖，他却幸灾乐祸。

sentences.english: Motorhead. Mastodon has been nominated a ton, but has never won.
sentences.chinese: 乳齿象乐队无数次获得提名，但是从来没有获奖过。

sentences.english: His prize-winning book is called Moy Sand and Gravel.
sentences.chinese: 他获奖的作品名叫《沙与碎石》。

sentences.english: There are no provisions for revoking the prize.
If the ranking of homing pigeons is not full, prize of other rankings shall be equally allocated by winning pigeons.
sentences.chinese: 如归巢获名次未满剩余名次奖金由获奖鸽均分。

sentences.english: NoteTab: Award-winning text and HTML editor.
The script is based on an award winning novel by Karel Schoeman.
sentences.chinese: 本剧改编自卡内尔斯克曼的获奖小说。

sentences.english: Pallavi Aiyar is an award winning journalist and author of two books.
sentences.chinese: 一名获奖记者，已出版两本著作。

definition: to determine the recipient of an award through discussion
to get past the qualifying round/to make it to the finals
to be chosen/to be elected as
